summary: This is a cover letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center, transmitting discovery materials to inmate Ghislaine Maxwell in her criminal case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the inmate at MDC to whom discovery materials are being sent in connection with her criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: U.S. Department of Justice United States Attorney Southern District of New York, The Sih io 1 Motto Building One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
MDCâ€”Metropolitan Detention Center Legal Department 80 29th Street Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: It is official correspondence from the U.S. Attorney's Office to the Metropolitan Detention Center regarding the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
The purpose is to transmit discovery materials to inmate Ghislaine Maxwell (Inmate #02879-509) and request she be allowed access to them.
